education.description: This is my only official web dev education. I learnd the Basics of PHP fullstack starting at simple HTML, CSS & JS, Moving to OOP PHP, Laravel framework and more.
Since Nov 2015 I encourage my self to learn new technologies such as React, WordPress, Vue and other web technologies

work.title: SEO Account manager
work.description: Had the responsibility to 50+ websites across North America (USA &Canada).
